entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
